add_faq_item.description: Adds a new question/answer item to an existing FAQ; supports categories.

props.name: source_url
props.description: An optional URL for the source of the information.

props.name: categories
props.description: A list of category names. New categories will be created if they do not exist.

add_video.description: Adds a YouTube video URL as knowledge to the Aidbase knowledge base.

props.name: video_url
props.description: The URL of the YouTube video to add as a knowledge source.

add_website.description: Adds a website URL as a knowledge source for Aidbase.

props.name: website_url
props.description: The URL of the website to add as a knowledge source (e.g., https://www.example.com).

create_chatbot_reply.description: Generates an AI chatbot reply given a message and optional session context.

props.name: message
props.description: The message or question to send to the chatbot.

props.name: session_id
props.description: An optional session ID to maintain conversation context. If omitted, a new conversation will start.

create_faq.description: Creates a new FAQ entry with title and description.

props.name: title
props.description: The title of the new FAQ knowledge base.

props.name: description
props.description: An optional description for the FAQ.

start_training.description: Starts a training job on an existing knowledge base item (FAQ, website, video, etc.).

email_priority_changed.description: Fires when an email’s priority is changed.

props.name: priority
props.description: Select the priority to trigger on. Leave blank to trigger for any priority change.

email_received.description: Fires when a new email is received in an Aidbase inbox.

email_sent.description: Fires when an email is sent from Aidbase.

email_status_changed.description: Fires when the status of an email changes.

props.name: status
props.description: Select the status to trigger on. Leave blank to trigger for any status change.

ticket_created.description: Fires when a new ticket is created in Aidbase.

ticket_new_comment.description: Fires when a new comment is added to an existing ticket.

props.name: commenter_type
props.description: Select the type of commenter to trigger on. Leave blank for all comments.

ticket_priority_changed.description: Fires when the priority of an existing ticket changes.

props.name: priority
props.description: Select the priority to trigger on. Leave blank to trigger for any priority change.

ticket_status_changed.description: Fires when a ticket’s overall status changes.

props.name: status
props.description: Select the status to trigger on. Leave blank to trigger for any status change.
